item.title: 福陆公司因 Starboard 收购股份而获利，敦促审查 NuScale 控股权
item.description: 周二，建筑公司福陆（Fluor Corp）的股票在盘前交易中上涨了6%，此前激进投资者Starboard Value持有该公司近5%的股份，旨在从其持有的NuScale Power公司40%的股份中释放价值，两位熟悉此事的消息人士告诉路透社。【原文：Shares of construction firm Fluor Corp rose 6% in premarket trading on Tuesday after activist investor Starboard Value took a nearly 5% stake, aiming to unlock value from its 40% holding in NuScale Power , two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 洛克希德-马丁公司因国防需求强劲而上调 2025 年业绩预期
item.description: 周二，美国国防承包商洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）上调了2025年的收入和利润预期，原因是在地缘政治紧张局势升级的情况下，对其战斗机和弹药的需求持续增长。【原文：U.S. defense contractor Lockheed Martin raised its 2025 forecast for revenue and profit on Tuesday, driven by sustained demand for its fighter jets and munitions amid escalating geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: Coinbase 就加密货币投资平台 Echo 签订 3.75 亿美元协议
item.description: 加密货币重量级公司 Coinbase 周二表示，它已以近 3.75 亿美元的现金加股票交易收购了投资平台 Echo，旨在为其平台带来筹款工具。【原文：Crypto heavyweight Coinbase said on Tuesday it has bought investment platform Echo in a nearly $375 million cash-and-stock deal, aiming to bring fundraising tools to its platform.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司第三季度末的积压订单额达到创纪录的 313 亿美元
item.description: 根据一份证券文件，截至第三季度末，巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）的确定订单积压达到创纪录的 313 亿美元，比去年同期增长 38%。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer's firm order backlog stood at a record $31.3 billion at the end of the third quarter, up 38% from a year earlier, according to a securities filing.】

item.title: 房屋销售放缓导致利润率下降，Pultegroup 第三季度利润下滑
item.description: 住宅建筑商普尔特集团（Pultegroup）周二公布的第三季度利润下降了 16%，原因是在高利率和持续通胀的背景下，购房者的优惠措施挤压了房屋销售利润。【原文：Homebuilder Pultegroup on Tuesday posted a 16% fall in third-quarter profit as buyer incentives squeezed home sales margins amid high interest rates and persistent inflation.】

item.title: 菲利普莫里斯上调利润预期，原因是对吸烟替代品的需求强劲
item.description: 菲利普莫里斯国际公司（Philip Morris International）受益于对其替代吸烟产品组合的强劲需求，于本周二第三次上调了年度利润预期。【原文：Philip Morris International raised its annual profit forecast for the third time this year on Tuesday, benefiting from strong demand for its portfolio of smoking alternatives.】

item.title: 纳斯达克利润因交易活动增加和金融科技需求而提升
item.description: 周二，交易所运营商纳斯达克公布了第三季度收入和利润增长报告，原因是持续的市场波动推动了交易量的增长，同时强劲的需求提升了其监管和欺诈管理解决方案业务。【原文：Exchange operator Nasdaq reported higher third-quarter revenue and profit on Tuesday, as persistent market volatility boosted trading volumes while robust demand lifted its regulatory and fraud management solutions businesses.】

item.title: 汽水需求稳定，可口可乐季度收入超预期
item.description: 本周二，可口可乐公司的收入和利润超过了华尔街对其第三季度的预期，这主要得益于对其商标汽水和零糖饮料的强劲需求。【原文：Coca-Cola's revenue and profit exceeded Wall Street's third-quarter expectations on Tuesday, helped by resilient demand for its trademark sodas and zero-sugar beverages.】

item.title: RTX 上调 2025 年预期，强劲需求抵消关税担忧
item.description: RTX 周二上调了全年利润和收入预期，这家航空航天和国防巨头表示，随着对其导弹和售后服务的需求上升，公司有信心有能力抵御关税的影响。【原文：RTX raised its full-year profit and revenue forecast on Tuesday, as the aerospace and defense giant signals confidence in its ability to weather the impact of tariffs in the wake of rising demand for its missiles and aftermarket services.】

item.title: 美国财报浪潮检验贸易和停摆希望
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 由于北美需求稳定，哈里伯顿第三季度利润超出预期
item.description: 哈里伯顿公司周二公布的第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于北美市场对其油田设备和服务的稳定需求。【原文：Halliburton beat Wall Street estimates for third quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by steady demand for its oilfield equipment and services in North America.】

item.title: 3M上调2025年利润预期，努力扩大利润率
item.description: 受成本削减措施和向高利润产品战略转型的推动，工业巨头 3M 周二上调了年度利润预期，使其股价在盘前交易中最高上涨了 2.6%。【原文：Industrial giant 3M raised annual profit forecast on Tuesday, driven by cost-cutting measures and a strategic shift toward high-margin products, sending its shares up as much as 2.6% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 需求强劲，诺斯罗普上调年度利润预期
item.description: 诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司周二连续第二个季度上调了 2025 年的利润预期，原因是这家国防承包商预计对其武器和军用飞机的需求将持续增长。【原文：Northrop Grumman raised its 2025 profit forecast for a second straight quarter on Tuesday, as the defense contractor expects continued demand for its weapons and military aircraft.】

item.title: 美国联邦储备委员会今年将再降息两次；2026 年的利率路径尚不明确
item.description: 路透社对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，美联储将在下周把关键利率下调 25 个基点，并在 12 月再次下调，经济学家们对明年年底的利率走势仍存在很大分歧。【原文：The Federal Reserve will lower its key interest rate by 25 basis points next week and again in December, according to a Reuters poll of economists who remain deeply divided on where rates will be by the end of next year.】

item.title: 通用汽车上调 2025 年核心利润预期
item.description: 通用汽车公司周二上调了调整后的年度核心利润预期，并押注其皮卡和 SUV 的强劲需求将有助于抵御美国关税和联邦电动汽车激励政策终止所带来的冲击。【原文：General Motors raised annual adjusted core profit forecast on Tuesday, betting that strong demand for its pickup trucks and SUVs would help counter a hit from U.S. tariffs and the end of a federal incentive for electric vehicles.】

item.title: 人工智能驱动的自动取款机瞄准持怀疑态度的俄罗斯人，将他们的黄金变现
item.description: 金融科技公司正在利用人工智能试图说服俄罗斯人在自动机器上兑现他们的黄金，尽管今年黄金价格已经上涨了 60% 以上，但这些公司仍面临着怀疑。【原文：Financial tech firms are using AI to try to persuade Russians to cash in their gold at automated machines, although despite this year's more than 60% price rally they are facing scepticism.】

item.title: 售后市场需求强劲，通用电气航空航天集团上调 2025 年利润预期
item.description: 通用电气航空航天公司周二上调了 2025 年的利润预期，预计由于新喷气式飞机短缺，对售后维修服务的需求旺盛，该公司今年的业绩将强劲收尾。【原文：GE Aerospace raised its 2025 profit forecast on Tuesday, projecting a strong finish to the year on robust demand for aftermarket maintenance services due to a shortage of new jets.】

item.title: 爱马仕任命格蕾丝-威尔士-邦纳为男装创意总监
item.description: Birkin手袋制造商爱马仕任命格蕾丝-威尔士-邦纳为男装创意总监，接替在该品牌工作了近40年的资深设计师维罗妮卡-尼查尼安。【原文：Birkin bag maker Hermes has named Grace Wales Bonner as its menswear creative director, replacing veteran Veronique Nichanian, who spent nearly four decades at the brand.】

item.title: 财报季势头强劲，华尔街期货暂停上涨
item.description: 继华尔街上一交易日强劲反弹之后，周二美国股指期货走低，原因是投资者准备迎接各大公司纷至沓来的季度财报。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged lower on Tuesday, following Wall Street's strong rally in the previous session, as investors prepared for a deluge of quarterly results from major corporations.】

item.title: 高盛在沙特阿拉伯成立私人财富管理团队
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）周二表示，将在沙特阿拉伯设立一个私人财富管理团队，以加强其在中东地区的业务，为该地区越来越多的高净值人士提供服务。【原文：Goldman Sachs is setting up a private wealth management team in Saudi Arabia, it said on Tuesday, as it boosts its offer in the Middle East to serve a growing number of high net worth individuals in the region.】

item.title: 美国石油协会（API）在 E15 汽油法案上反其道而行之，呼吁采取监管措施
item.description: 美国石油学会周二表示，反对立法扩大 E15 汽油的全年销售，这一反转凸显了石油和乙醇行业在短暂合作后日益加深的紧张关系。【原文：The American Petroleum Institute said on Tuesday it opposes legislation to expand year-round sales of E15 gasoline, a reversal that underscores deepening tensions between the oil and ethanol industries after a brief period of cooperation.】

item.title: 摩根大通在纽约耗资 30 亿美元建造摩天大楼吸引员工
item.description: 摩根大通本周将在曼哈顿中城启用其 60 层高、耗资 30 亿美元的新总部，该银行希望其现代化的设施将有助于招募更多员工。【原文：As JPMorgan Chase opens its new 60-story, $3 billion headquarters in Midtown Manhattan this week, the bank hopes its modern amenities will help recruit more employees.】

item.title: 尽管美国人将停摆归咎于共和党人，但特朗普的支持率仍呈上升趋势
item.description: 路透社/益普索（Reuters/Ipsos）最新民调显示，对于政府部分关门，美国人对共和党立法者的指责多于民主党立法者，该民调还显示共和党总统唐纳德-特朗普的支持率略有上升。【原文：Americans blame Republican lawmakers more than Democratic lawmakers for a partial government shutdown, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos poll that also showed Republican President Donald Trump's approval rating increasing slightly.】

item.title: 洞察力：诺和诺德争取继续由医疗补助计划支付减肥药费用
item.description: 根据州政府文件、公司电子邮件以及与立法者和倡导者的访谈，诺和诺德公司为其肥胖症药物Wegovy游说赢得了医疗补助报销，在美国一些州为治疗费用而苦苦挣扎时，该公司正在为保留这一报销范围而斗争。【原文：Novo Nordisk, which lobbied to win Medicaid reimbursement for its obesity drug Wegovy, is fighting to keep that coverage as some U.S. states struggle with the treatment's costs, according to state documents, company emails and interviews with lawmakers and advocates.】

item.title: 有代价的增长特斯拉的廉价电动汽车可能会重振销量，但会挤压利润
item.description: 分析师认为，每辆车数千美元的成本削减并不足以保护利润率。【原文：The profitability of Tesla's so-called affordable new cars will be in focus when the electric vehicle maker reports quarterly results on Wednesday, and analysts think that thousands of dollars in cost cuts per vehicle will not be quite enough to protect profit margins.】

item.title: 因人工智能需求强劲，台湾 9 月出口订单大幅超出预期
item.description: 由于台湾作为人工智能（AI）产业重要枢纽的增长抵消了对美国关税的担忧，台湾 9 月份的出口订单增幅超过预期，连续第八个月增长。【原文：Taiwan's export orders rose more than expected in September, increasing for an eighth consecutive month, as the island's growth as an essential hub for the artificial intelligence (AI) industry offset worries about U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 九月份瑞士对美出口激增，制药业发货量增加
item.description: 瑞士政府周二的数据显示，9月份瑞士对美国的出口大幅反弹，制药公司在美国开征关税前加大了出货量。【原文：Swiss exports to the United States rebounded sharply in September, with pharmaceutical companies ramping up their shipments ahead of the introduction of U.S. tariffs, government data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 关税风险冲击国际航运，大韩航空季度货运收入下滑
item.description: 大韩航空 003490 KS 报告称，由于美国和中国加征关税的风险增加，该公司本财年第三季度的货运收入有所下降。【原文：Korean Air 003490 KS reported a drop in cargo revenue for the third quarter of its financial year, as the carrier saw increased risks from tariffs by the U.S. and China.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，芯片制造商 CXMT 计划在上海上市，估值 420 亿美元
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，中国存储芯片制造商长鑫存储科技（CXMT）计划最快于明年第一季度在上海进行首次公开募股，目标估值高达3000亿元人民币（421.2亿美元）。【原文：Chinese memory chipmaker ChangXin Memory Technologies (CXMT) plans an initial public offer in Shanghai as soon as the first quarter of next year, eyeing a valuation of up to 300 billion yuan ($42.12 billion), two sources briefed on the matter said.】

item.title: 美澳稀土交易是个开端，但短期内无法撼动中国的主导地位
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对澳大利亚关键矿产的支持将为该行业带来急需的资金支持，但专家们表示，要想将供应链从中国转移出去并削弱中国的市场主导地位，这位美国总统还需要等待更长的时间。【原文：Donald Trump's backing of Australia's critical minerals will bring much-needed financial support to the industry, but experts say the U.S. president will have to wait longer to shift the supply chain away from China and weaken its market dominance.】
